item.title: The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server.
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Error: The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. after upgrading php. Just run the below command on your terminal, which create symbolic link to your phpmyadmin directory. sudo ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin /var/www done..

The post The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Error:

The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. after upgrading php.

Just run the below command on your terminal, which create symbolic link to your phpmyadmin directory.

sudo ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin /var/www

done..

The post The requested URL /phpmyadmin/index.php was not found on this server. appeared first on .

item.title: Allow local network user to access phpmyadmin(WAMP)
item.dc:creator: Suraj Koli
item.description:
Steps : 1) Left click system tray icon and navigate Apache 2) go to Alias Directories 3) then http://localhost/phpmyadmin — edit alias 4 a) To allow from select IP or Domain Options Indexes FollowSymLinks ExecCGI AllowOverride all Order Deny, Allow…

The post Allow local network user to access phpmyadmin(WAMP) appeared first on .
item.content:encoded:
Steps :

1) Left click system tray icon and navigate Apache

2) go to Alias Directories

3) then http://localhost/phpmyadmin — edit alias

4 a) To allow from select IP or Domain

Options Indexes FollowSymLinks ExecCGI
AllowOverride all
Order Deny, Allow
Allow from 198.162.1.100
Allow from localhost

b) allow from all

Options Indexes FollowSymLinks ExecCGI
AllowOverride all
Order Deny, Allow
Allow from all

The post Allow local network user to access phpmyadmin(WAMP) appeared first on .
